name: Doors
description: ​DOORS is a story based first person shooter game in which the protagonist awakes in a seemingly endless void and must persist through his delusions to discover the truth about his fate and understand why he is there. Armed with a shotgun and a Pistol, The Player will explore various different delusions through 3 main segments of the game in which the player will need to strategically shoot through and kill all enemies to progress through the game.
